headline: GE Vernova and 16 More Stocks for a ‘Nuclear Renaissance’
summary: Barron’s identified 17 stocks that can benefit from nuclear trends.  “Interest in nuclear power is growing, especially as load growth stress-tests traditional gas generation supply chains and more so as net zero goals require hyperscalers and data centers to move to net zero carbon sources,” wrote Mizuho analyst Maheep Mandloi in a Monday report.  Enter nuclear power.

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: GE Vernova, Constellation Energy and Nvidia
summary: GE Vernova jumps into focus as Zacks spotlights nuclear-driven AI energy plays trading well below their highs and primed for long-term demand growth.
